column5: Enjoy 1.5 acres on a lakefront lot and a resort-like living space at this 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental home that sleeps 9 just outside of Corsicana on Richland Chambers Reservoir. Nestled in an exclusive community, this home is just an hour from Dallas / Fort Worth, an hour and a half from Waco, and 2 hours from College Station. With a custom flagstone fire pit, a deck with gas grill and hot tub, and a huge backyard that extends down to a private dock, this home ensures a memorable getaway.
column8: New! Private Lakefront 4BR Home w/ Dock & Hot Tub!
